channel.title: Comments on: Jedi
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jenny
item.dc:creator: Jenny
item.description: Who was your teacher? I had Mrs. Kever. I spent the whole year in the hallway on punishment, had to stay inside for recess and got spanked daily. (I had a rough transitional period at this time. I had lost my dogs, Mike-the love of my life, my great-gramma, and had moved houses and churches. Then some of my school friends transferred to other schools and my cousin had moved to Texas.)
item.content:encoded: Who was your teacher? I had Mrs. Kever. I spent the whole year in the hallway on punishment, had to stay inside for recess and got spanked daily. (I had a rough transitional period at this time. I had lost my dogs, Mike-the love of my life, my great-gramma, and had moved houses and churches. Then some of my school friends transferred to other schools and my cousin had moved to Texas.)
